es.name: General
es.description: Gastos generales que no encajan en otras categorías.

es.name: Salud
es.description: Gastos relacionados con la salud, como consultas médicas y medicamentos.

es.name: Tecnología
es.description: Compras de dispositivos electrónicos, software y servicios tecnológicos.

es.name: Supermercado
es.description: Compras de alimentos y productos de uso diario.

es.name: Transporte
es.description: Gastos de transporte, como gasolina, transporte público y taxis.

es.name: Vivienda
es.description: Gastos relacionados con la vivienda, como alquiler o hipoteca.

es.name: Entretenimiento
es.description: Gastos en actividades recreativas, como cine, conciertos y eventos.

es.name: Ahorros
es.description: Dinero reservado para el futuro, inversiones o emergencias.

es.name: Suscripciones
es.description: Pagos recurrentes por servicios como streaming, productos o membresías.

en.name: General
en.description: General expenses that do not fit into other categories.

en.name: Health
en.description: Expenses related to health, such as medical consultations and medications.

en.name: Technology
en.description: Purchases of electronic devices, software, and technology services.

en.name: Supermarket
en.description: Purchases of food and daily use products.

en.name: Transport
en.description: Transportation expenses, such as fuel, public transport, and taxis.

en.name: Housing
en.description: Expenses related to housing, such as rent or mortgage.

en.name: Entertainment
en.description: Expenses on recreational activities, such as movies, concerts, and events.

en.name: Savings
en.description: Money set aside for the future, investments, or emergencies.

en.name: Subscriptions
en.description: Recurring payments for services like streaming, products, or memberships.
